A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a fan of the old Star Wars films\, I have wanted to love the recent episodes put out by Disney\, but have been sorely disappointed each time. The Last Jedi is no exception: a loosely developed plot with lots of jumping back and forth paired with at least an hour too long of screen time made for a waste of my time and money. I am sad to say that I am giving up on investing time into future releases.
